member.name: T:SobekCM.Engine_Library.Aggregations.Item_Aggregation_Utilities
member.summary: Class is used to build the appropriate instance of the object. This class pulls the data from the database, fills the object, and then performs final preparation for displaying the item aggregation via the web.

member.name: M:SobekCM.Engine_Library.Aggregations.Item_Aggregation_Utilities.Get_Complete_Item_Aggregation(System.String,SobekCM.Tools.Custom_Tracer)
member.summary: Gets a fully built item aggregation object for a particular aggregation code
member.param: Code for this aggregation object
Trace object keeps a list of each method executed and important milestones in rendering
member.returns: Fully built item aggregation object for the particular aggregation code and language code
member.remarks:
Item aggregation object is also placed in the cache.
Building of an item aggregation always starts by pulling the item from the database ( either or ).
Then, either the Item Aggregation XML file is read (if present) or the entire folder hierarchy is analyzed to find the browses, infos, banners, etc..

member.param: Item aggregation to which to add the ALL ITEMS and NEW ITEMS browse
member.remarks: This method is always called while building an item aggregation, irregardless of whether there is an item aggregation configuration XML file or not.

member.name: T:SobekCM.Engine_Library.Email.Email_Helper
member.summary: Class is used to send emails according to this instance of SobekCM's settings

member.name: M:SobekCM.Engine_Library.Email.Email_Helper.SendEmail(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Sends an email using the currently selected email method ( i.e., direct SMTP or database mail )
member.param: To address for the email to send

member.name: T:SobekCM.Engine_Library.Solr.Solr_Document_Result
member.summary: Stores the information relating to a single result from ansearch within a Solr index
member.remarks:
This is populated by the Solr query through SolrNet, using the SolrNet property attributes as guides. The highlighted snippet containing the search term(s) for this page is also loaded into this object
This class implements both the and interfaces because Solr/Lucene search results are a flattened, non-hierarchical structure. Each result contains all the title and item information within a single result object.

member.name: P:SobekCM.Engine_Library.Solr.Solr_Document_Result.Level1_Text
member.summary: Text of the first serial hierarchy level for this item within a title within a collection of results
member.remarks: This is required by the interface, but is not really implement in this instance since Solr/Lucene results are always a single item/title, rather than a collection of items within a title which would require serial hierarchy. The empty string is always returned.

member.name: T:SobekCM.Engine_Library.Solr.Solr_Page_Result
member.summary: Stores the information relating to a single page result from an in-document search against a Solr index
member.remarks: This is populated by the Solr query through SolrNet, using the SolrNet property attributes as guides. The highlighted snippet containing the search term(s) for this page is also loaded into this object

member.summary: Constructor for a new instancee of the Solr_Page_Result class

member.summary: Unique PageID for this single page result from a search within a document

member.summary: Page order for this single page result from a search within a document

member.summary: Name of this page for this single page result from a search within a document

member.summary: Thumbnail image for this page results

member.summary: Constructor for a new instance of the Solr_Page_Results class

member.name: M:SobekCM.Engine_Library.Solr.Solr_Page_Results.Search(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Perform an in-document search for pages with matching full-text
member.param: Bibliographic identifier (BibID) for the item to search
Volume identifier for the item to search
Terms to search for within the page text
Number of results to display per a "page" of results
Which page of results to return ( one-based, so the first page is page number of one )
Flag indicates whether to sort the results by relevancy score, rather than the default page order
member.returns: Page search result object with all relevant result information

member.name: P:SobekCM.Engine_Library.Solr.Solr_Page_Results.Results
member.summary: Gets the collection of single page search results associated with this search

member.name: P:SobekCM.Engine_Library.Solr.Solr_Page_Results.QueryTime
member.summary: Time, in millseconds, required for this query on the Solr search engine

member.name: P:SobekCM.Engine_Library.Solr.Solr_Page_Results.TotalResults
member.summary: Number of total results in the complete result set

member.name: P:SobekCM.Engine_Library.Solr.Solr_Page_Results.Query
member.summary: Actual query string conducted by the SobekCM user and then processed against the Solr search engine

member.name: P:SobekCM.Engine_Library.Solr.Solr_Page_Results.Sort_By_Score
member.summary: Flag indicates if these search results were sorted by score, rather than the default sorting by page order

member.name: P:SobekCM.Engine_Library.Solr.Solr_Page_Results.Page_Number
member.summary: Page number of these results within the complete results
member.remarks: The Solr/Lucene searches only return a "page" of results at a time. The page number is a one-based indexed, with the first page being number 1 (not zero).
